name: Ingenious Engineering: Harnessing Annihilation
description: After a Pneuma-Ousia Annihilation Reaction occurs on an opponent's character: Generate 2 Omni Element. (When a character is defeated, a Pneuma-Ousia Annihilation Reaction will not be triggered)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After a $[K1015] occurs on an opponent's character:</color> Generate 2 $[K411]. (When a character is defeated, a $[K1015] will not be triggered)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After a Pneuma-Ousia Annihilation Reaction occurs on an opponent's character:</color> Generate 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>. (When a character is defeated, a Pneuma-Ousia Annihilation Reaction will not be triggered)
